alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Garland, south central Saline and northeastern Hot Spring Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rockport, or 8 miles northwest of Malvern. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Malvern... Rockport... Traskwood... Perla... Lonsdale... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Rockwell... Hot Springs National Park... Bismarck... Magnet Cove... Red Oak... Oaklawn Racetrack... Nance... Gifford... Glen Rose... De Roche... Lake Catherine State Park... Gulpha Gorge... Pettyview... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 92 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
